objects.query: SELECT Description, DeveloperName, Language, MasterLabel, PrimaryObject, ProcessType FROM ProcedurePlanDefinition
SELECT DefaultReadContextMapping, DefaultSaveContextMapping, DeveloperName, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, InheritedFrom, IsActive, ProcedurePlanDefinitionId, Rank FROM ProcedurePlanDefinitionVersion
SELECT Description, Phase, ProcedurePlanVersionId, ResolutionType, SectionType, Sequence, SubSectionType FROM ProcedurePlanSection

objectSets.name: Second Pass - Upsert ProcedurePlanOptions with ExpressionSet Links

objects.query: SELECT SubSectionType, Sequence, ProcedurePlanVersionId FROM ProcedurePlanSection
SELECT ProcedurePlanSectionId, ExpressionSetDefinitionId, Priority, CriteriaLogic, ReadContextMapping, SaveContextMapping FROM ProcedurePlanOption
